TopicTitle: The Martian story line for RSS

Articles.Content: The Martian is soon to be out in theaters and it's one of the best books I've ever read. anyone playing KSP should absolutely read it. Is anyone working on a mod or ad on for RSS to make this a fun nostalgic campaign or series of missions?

Well it isn't for RSS, but selfish_meme is working on the Dunatian (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130493-The-Dunatian-Crafts-and-Playable-Save-File-Scenario), which is putting together a save file based on the martian, if you are interested.
